plot:
The Real Thumbelina is a documentary which sees the cameras following four-year-old Amelie Gledhill as she is about to begin school in Halifax. The problem is though she’s not bigger than a baby, and has to have her school uniform specially madee. She suffers with Russell Silver Syndrome, a genetic disorder which stunts her growth.
